name: History of the Demon Girl - A Comedic Journey Through Hell
blurb: Race your way through the 9 Circles of Hell in this 2-D pixelated adventure, inspired by Dante's The Divine Comedy!

rewards.reward: No Reward

~~~~DIGITAL WALLPAPER!!!~~~~\r\n============================= \r\nFor $1, you'll receive a backer exclusive History of the Demon Girl digital wallpaper in one of three colors! Please enjoy this gift and use it to arrange your desktop icons while feeling warm and fuzzy about funding indie development! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **Includes a personal thanks!

==========NEW TIER!==========\r\n~~~~EARLY OST DOWNLOAD~~~~\r\n============================= For $3, you can show your support for indie games and grab an EARLY DOWNLOAD of the soundtrack! Since the soundtrack will be finalized before the game is complete, you should receive it about a month ahead of the game's release! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **Includes the digital wallpaper and a personal thanks!

GREENLIGHT SPECIAL!!!
  

In response to receiving over 500 "Yes" votes on Steam, I'm offering 500 DRM-Free copies of the game at the lower level of a $3 pledge!  


Other deals may follow, but this special will not be repeated!  


**INCLUDES COPY OF THE GAME AND STEAM KEY IF GREENLIT**

A DRM-Free copy of History of the Demon Girl (playable on Windows and Mac). If the game is greenlit, all backers in this tier will receive a Steam Key as well.\r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**
A digital copy of the Behind The Scenes PDF booklet which lists your name as a "Booklet Backer."\r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

Choose one of four 2" white vinyl stickers. Perfect for water bottles, laptop cases, and more! Also receive "Stuck On You" credit in the game and BTS booklet. (May expand reward if initial goal is met!) \r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**
A digital copy of the soundtrack and "Groovers & Shakers" credit in the final version of the game and in the BTS booklet.\r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

Access to early builds of the game. Play the levels as they develop and give feedback! Also a digital copy of the bonus soundtrack with early and alternate versions of songs from the game! "J. Edgar Groovers" in the credits.\r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

A 1" pin featuring the standard Token art from History of the Demon Girl. These pins are not numbered or signed. "Pinned" in the credits. (May expand limit if initial goal is met!)\r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

Choose two of four 2" white vinyl stickers. Perfect for water bottles, laptop cases, and more! "Really Stuck On You" in the credits. (May expand reward if initial goal is met!)\r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

A 1" pin featuring the boost Token art from History of the Demon Girl. These pins are not numbered or signed. "Boosters" in the credits. (May expand limit if initial goal is met!)\r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

~~~TRIPLE STICKER PACK!!!~~~
============================= 
At $45, you'll be able to choose three of the four 2" white vinyl stickers. Perfect for water bottles, laptop cases, and more! You'll also be listed under "GET IT OFF!" in the credits.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

A limited edition 1" pin featuring the standard Token art from History of the Demon Girl. Each pin will be numbered and signed with an "S64." Will appear as "Going Steady" in the credits.\r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

COLLECT THEM ALL STICKER PACK!
============================= 
For $55, you'll receive ALL FOUR 2" white vinyl stickers. Want to mix and match? Go for it! Perfect for water bottles, laptop cases, and more! For backing at this level you'll be listed under the amazing "Collect Them All!" section of the credits.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

==========NEW TIER!==========
~~~~~THE DOUBLE PIN PACK~~~~~
============================= For $60, you can now receive not just one but BOTH the standard and boost token pins! You'll also be listed under "Gimme a Double!" in the credits! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
*These pins are not signed or numbered. 
=============================
**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

A 64x64 pixel portrait of your likeness will display in the game during the credits under "Facetime". You will also receive a copy of this image via email. \r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

An extremely limited edition pin featuring the boost Token art from History of the Demon Girl. These awesome pins will be numbered and signed with an "S64." Will appear as "Special Someones" in the credits.\r\n\r\n**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

==========NEW TIER!==========
~~~~~~WALK THE EARTH!!!~~~~~~
============================= For $120, you'll be featured as one of the 30 living, breathing folks just milling about town when Roku explodes from the depths during the game's ending! I'll work with you to make the sprite look as much like you as I can, plus you'll get a copy of the sprite emailed to you for keeps! You'll also be listed under "Just Another Day" in the credits!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**

~~~SKYPE WITH THE CREATOR!~~~
============================= 
For $1000, you'll get an hour long Skype session with creator Danny "Shadow64" Mastrangelo where you can discuss games, game design, art, music, or just hold a general Q&A! Your credit will appear in the game be under "Extreme Close Up"!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS AND ONE STANDARD PIN AND BOOST PIN**

~~~THE SUPREME BACKER!!!!!~~~
=============================
"There can be only one!" Danny "Shadow64" Mastrangelo will give you an exclusive sneak peek at the next SIlhouette Games title (Development will start after Demon Girl's completion). This tier also includes an hour-long Skype session and "The Supreme Backer" credit in the final version of the game. In addition, you will receive one standard token pin, one boost token pin, and a one-of-a-kind Supreme Token (gold-looking version) pin. Finally, you will receive ALL FOUR of the 2" stickers (or whatever combination you'd like).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
**INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS NON-LIMITED REWARDS**
